Spanish Omelette

Prepare yourself to be one of the best cooks in the country

In the following recipes and video-tutorials you will learn everything about cooking you will not ever have again pot noodles for lunch or dinner. Because you will have enough knowledge to cook any dish you wish (know I'm a poet)

TIME

You will need to spend time if you want to become a master-chef. But do not worry about that because you will enjoy the experience and will not think

EFFORT

Becoming a master-chef is not something you can achieve in only one day, you will need to try hard to keep improving your skills until you reach the top of the cuisine industry

INGREDIENTS

Cooking is also about using the best materials you can find at the market, look for organic shops to buy your meat and fruit, avoid supermarkets like Tesco and Lidl for that kind of food
